channel.title: I have no choice, but to ask for help
channel.description:
Okay, before we even get started here, I want you to understand that I actually did have everything working at one point, so I'm not stupid. And I have done hours and hours and hours and hours of reading on how to fix this, but I have had no luck. So I am asking for some help now :\
I had my ports forwarded and everything was running perfectly, and then my internet went out for about 20 minutes. I figured that I would unplug my routers and my modem for a minute and then plug them in.. worst mistake I've made in a while.
My ports are no longer forwarded and I can NOT get it to work again, I've tried and tried and tried.
The thing that's tricky about my house, is that I have my modem, which plugs into a router, and then that router runs up into my room and powers my router. So all together I have 1 modem and 2 routers.
ANY help is appreciated. Please and Thank You

item.title: I have no choice, but to ask for help
